Reviews.Content: july month travel dubai pretty hot temperature hovering 45 degrees 48 degrees celsius day 36 degrees 39 degrees celsius night located al found quiet conventient hotel super market street wellsized washrooms neat clean housekeeping people twice clean service pretty satisfactory supervisory staff makes cleaned quickly servicestaff friendly helpful common electricity adaptor quickly internet services little slow probably server overcrowded sufficient bandwidth enjoyed desi delicious food including tandoori chicken watch cultural folk singers folk dancers musicians hotel pool hot facility day time gym equipped night club disco fairly popular quality food served restaurants fairly airport pick drops satisfactory hotel travel desk facilitates sight seeing participation activites desert safari visit burj coffe shop ground floor spacious nice greet guests visitors hotel sufficient parking proximity airport makes ideal business travellers overall recommend hotel business travellers tourists moderate reasonable budget
